title: I got suspended for 14 days.....
body: So recently I got a chat restriction (24 games) then got suspended for 14 days after the 14 days are over will I still have to play my 24 games to get the chat restriction removed?

replies.body: Yes, if you still had chat restrictions you'll need to work them off, a ban doesn't overwrite them.
A ban does not overwrite chat restrictions.
do the discount mods on these forums permaban accounts from forums or only forum ban >:)
